attributes.additional_details:
Heating oil should be regulated just as it is for electricity and gas!!!

It is very unfair that we must order a minimum of 500 litres when 300 is more affordable! 500 litres is now over £300 where as it would be easier to raise money for the 300 litres.

There are many people who will/do run out of heating oil as they cannot afford the minimum order for heating oil!

We want to see the minimum order of 500 litres changed to 300 litres or the price of heating oil change!

It needs to be regulated just like everything else!
